product_name: LancomeDual Finish Multi-Tasking Lightweight Pressed Powder Foundation
summary: SummaryLancÃ´me Dual Finish Multi-Tasking Lightweight Pressed Powder Foundation is a sheer to full-coverage, mattifying and long-lasting powder and foundation in one. It can be applied wet or dry.
details: DetailsFeaturesA face powder with a weightless feel and a shine-free, natural matte finishIt does not cake or dry out skinBenefitsIn wet makeup application, Dual Finish's unique cosmetic emulsifiers allow this pressed foundation powder to function just like a liquid foundationIn dry makeup application, it's specialized emollients set onto skin seamlessly and condition skin's surfaceIf you're looking for the best foundation for coverage, Dual Finish can also be worn over LancÃ´me's Teint Idole full-coverage foundation for even more coverageFrom normal to oily skin, dry to combination skin, it's suitable for all skin typesItem 2235364How To UseFor more coverage, apply using the press & roll technique with the Dual Finish Puff. For less coverage, dust on lightly with a Powder Brush. For a creamy look apply Dual Finish with a damp sponge.Artistry Tip: Dual Finish Versatile powder foundation can be used for every makeup look. Use a press and roll motion with powder brush #1 to set makeup and complete your look.IngredientsTalc, Mineral Oil, Squalane, Zinc Laurate, Stearic Acid, Linalool, Geraniol, Glyceryl Stearate, Triethanolamine, Isoeugenol, Cholesterol, Coumarin, Aluminum Myristates/Palmitates, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Limonene, Lanolin, Hydroxycitronellal, Petrolatum, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Fragrance, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylparaben. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For more coverage, apply using the press & roll technique with the Dual Finish Puff. For less coverage, dust on lightly with a Powder Brush. For a creamy look apply Dual Finish with a damp sponge.Artistry Tip: Dual Finish Versatile powder foundation can be used for every makeup look. Use a press and roll motion with powder brush #1 to set makeup and complete your look.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I have been buying this product (same shade!) for many years. The one I received is LIGHTER than it has ever been. Ever. I'm glad I didn't order more than one, as I was going to order three.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments: I do not like the coverage, too heavy.

reviews.headline: I've tried other less expensive pressed powders, but....
reviews.comments: I've tried other less expensive pressed powders, but I just keep coming back to Lancombe.  The smooth powder goes on like butter and stays fresh all day.

reviews.headline: Not flattering
reviews.comments: The L'OrÃ©al powder foundation works 100x better than this. This stuff settles in your creases and looks cakey.. go look at the other reviews with photos and you'll see how unflattering this product is. Returned ASAP.

reviews.headline: I am Loving This Powder
reviews.comments:
I was a littler bothered when I saw the price of this, but once I used this, I quickly forgot about it! This powder is fantastic because not only can I use it as a dry concealing powder, but also with a sponge as a wet cream concealer/foundation as well! 
I'm very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: This product goes on light or full coverage which ever you perfer. Clean fresh look, makes your skin look radiant n young........

reviews.headline: Love this powder! It has great coverage
reviews.comments: Love this powder! It has great coverage.  I have been using it for 6 months now and it will take a lot to get me to change!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love the natural look of the coverage

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I will definitely buy this powder again. Looks good, feels good and even smells good.

reviews.headline: The BEST
reviews.comments: This is my go to casual day foundation and night out powder!  It's fantastic! Flawless finish even for aging skin!

reviews.headline: I love this powder.
reviews.comments: I have used this for years. It has wonderful coverage.

reviews.headline: $$$$ but Solid
reviews.comments:
It's definitely on the pricey side, but I did succumb to desperation and spend the cash. 

I don't have perfect skin, I struggle with texture, oil, and minor breakouts. For me, less is more, and I'm using this to set concealer only (specifically, the NYX Bare with Me serum & the Ulta Beauty Color Correcting Concealer). 
It's finely milled, doesn't look cakey, does control oil, and evens out my skin tone. As for building the coverage, I set the powder with a water mister rather than using a wet applicator. At then end, yes, texture is still visible but softened. My face looks great in natural light, plus it photographs well. Overall, I'm happy with it, but the cost is a splurge.

reviews.headline: I love it.
reviews.comments: I put it over my idÃ´le foundation and it looks so pretty. Also it smells really nice, and the scent isn't too strong. I don't even smell it when it's on my skin.

reviews.headline: Why the fragrance?!?
reviews.comments: This product was AMAZING. I wanted to love it SO badly. But the fragrance is insane. I constantly had a whiff of old lady perfume and it was headache inducing. I wish they made it fragrance free. :(

reviews.headline: Great coverage without the cake
reviews.comments: This is my favorite! I don't wear a lot of makeup and I have mature skin and this doesn't sink into my creases nor is it cakey.

reviews.headline: Powder Foundation
reviews.comments: I use this powder foundation every day and I love it. Great coverage. It does not emphasize any skin imperfections.

reviews.headline: Fantastic product!!
reviews.comments: I'm 57 years old, this product makes my skin a perfect look, I will continually use, most recommended with my friends.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: I will buy this again and again.
reviews.comments: Great coverage  from this makeup

faceoff_positive.comments: This is the most incredible make-up and I've used it for years. Now that Lancome has discontinued its fragrance free version I don't know what I will do! Is it really necessary to put fragrance in all make-up products?!
faceoff_positive.headline: PLEASE BRING BACK FRAGRANCE FREE!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have using the Dual Finish fragrance-free for years, the fragranced dual finish causes my face to break out. Now I am forced to go to another counter, but I love Lancome. Please please bring back the fragrance-free or maybe stop putting fragrance in the powder.
faceoff_negative.headline: PLEASE BRING BACK THE FRAGRANCE-FREE
